AZ + EL control, Satellites Tracking, Moon Tracking, DSNâ€”intended for VHF, UHF, SHF

PstRotator supports separate antenna rotator controllers for Azimuth and Elevation control. It can control two separate rotor interfaces: one for azimuth and the second for elevation, or it can control a single azimuth + elevation rotor interface.

Connect the rotator interfaces to PC using the RS232 ports or USB to serial converters, and select the communication ports from the available COM Ports.
